EloML
part of the DrWhy.AI developed by the MI^2 DataLab 0.2.0
  • Reference

Test the differences between two Elo Scores

Source: R/wald_test.R
test_players_diff.Rd

The test is based on the Wald test.

test_players_diff(elo, player1, player2)

Arguments

elo

object of class elo_results.
player1

Name of the first player to test
player2

Name of the second player to test

Examples

data(auc_scores)
elo <- calculate_elo(auc_scores[1:400,], keep_model = TRUE, estimation = "glm")

#> Warning: glm.fit: fitted probabilities numerically 0 or 1 occurred
test_players_diff(elo, "gbm_10", "gbm_2")

#> Wald-based test for the difference between gbm_10 and gbm_10.
#> Test statistic:  13.61194 
#> p-value:  0.001107146
